  • HTTP Routing Table

HTTP Routing Table

/article | /board
 
/article
GET /article/(int:article_id)
GET /article/(int:article_id)/comment
POST /article
POST /article/(int:article_id)/comment
PUT /article/(int:article_id)
PUT /article/(int:article_id)/(int:comment_id)
DELETE /article/(int:article_id)
DELETE /article/(int:article_id)/(int:comment_id)
 
/board
GET /board/(string:board_id)
